resources.string: Welcome to Cannibal Open Touch! Use the options below to configure Cannibal Open Touch. If you do not have the Cannibal Open Touch recovery installed, please download and install it from http://www.projectopencannibal.net!\n
Enter the path of the directory you wish to save nandroid backups. Example: If you wish to save to /sdcard/mybackup, simply type the word \"mybackup\" (without quotes).
